bug.author: rkooo567
bug.summary: [Dashboard] New dashboard crashes when looking at worker logs.
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h3>What is the problem?</denchmark-h>
Not sure if it is reproducible in a single node. But when I ran multi-nodes clusters (59 nodes), the attempt to see worker logs from the UI crashed the frontend. <denchmark-h:h3>Reproduction (REQUIRED)</denchmark-h>
Please provide a script that can be run to reproduce the issue. The script should have no external library dependencies (i.e., use fake or mock data / environments): If we cannot run your script, we cannot fix your issue.
I have verified my script runs in a clean environment and reproduces the issue. I have verified the issue also occurs with the latest wheels.

comments.comment:
This doesn't seem reproducible. I checked to see whether I could reproduce in the stress test which runs a large cluster. I think this might have been related to what this PR fixed: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/ray-project/ray/pull/12660>#12660</denchmark-link>
Please let me know if you see it again or can reproduce.
